name.en: Antenna Theory and Radio Wave Propagation

department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.ch: 電磁波為基本物理研究最重要的工具之一，而天線則是無線電磁波發射與接收的工具，無線電磁波應用面極廣，凡涉及資訊的傳播及中間實物媒介的特性研究都需要了解無線電磁波。本課程專為高年級大學生與碩一生設計。
goal.en: Antenna theory and radio wave propagation are important to basic physical researches and the corresponding applications. This course is proposed to introduce the basic antenna and radio wave propagation theories to senior  college students and/or junior graduated students.

outline.ch: 課程內容包含：1. 基本線性分析，2. 電動力學基本原理，3.平面波傳播特性，4.無方向性媒介波傳播，5.有方向性媒介波傳播，6. 基本天線原理，7. 天線種類與介紹。
outline.en:
Contents:
Theory of Electromagnetic Waves (Hollis C. Chen)
Chapter 1:Linear Analysis
Chapter 2:Basic Equations of Electrodynamics
Chapter 3:Some General Properties of Plane Waves
Chapter 4:Plane Waves in Isotropic Media
Antennas (John D. Kraus)
Chapter 1: Basic Antenna Theory
Chapter 2: Antenna Types and Concepts

flexDiscription.ch: 至花蓮或屏東參觀電離層高頻雷達系統與實際系統操作，實務系統參數更改與操作，以及資料分析。
flexDiscription.en: Visiting and operating the HF radars at Hualien or Pingtung for ionospheric sounding, practicing system operation with different system parameter, and data analysis and processing.
